css_class.description: In rendering environments that support HTML the css_class can be appended to the dom elements' class attribute.

updated_date.description: Represents an update that occurred on the node this block is attached to. DOES NOT indicate an update to the block itself. eg an article with a twitter block with updated_date means that the article was updated to include that twitter block.

poster_image_ref.description: A reference to an image asset to use as the poster that will override what is provided by twitter.
